verses.verse: Now in the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> might be <S%H3615>fulfilled,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5782>stirred<s%> up the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia,<s%> that he made a <S%H5674>proclamation<s%> <S%H6963><s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> and put it <S%H1571>also<s%> in <S%H4385>writing,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> me <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and he has <S%H6485>charged<s%> me to <S%H1129>build<s%> him an <S%H1004>house<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

<S%H4310>Who<s%> is there among you of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people?<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> be with him, and let him <S%H5927>go<s%> up to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> (he is the <S%H430>God,<s%>) <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H7604>remains<s%> in <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> he <S%H1481>sojournes,<s%> let the <S%H582>men<s%> of his <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H5375>help<s%> him with <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and with <S%H7399>goods,<s%> and with <S%H929>beasts,<s%> <S%H5973>beside<s%> the <S%H5071>freewill<s%> offering for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> that is in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Then <S%H6965>rose<s%> up the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> them <S%H853>whose<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H5782>raised,<s%> to <S%H5927>go<s%> up to <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> they that were <S%H5439>about<s%> them <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> with <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> with <S%H7399>goods,<s%> and with <S%H929>beasts,<s%> and with <S%H4030>precious<s%> things, <S%H905>beside<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that was <S%H5068>willingly<s%> offered.

Also <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> had <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and had <S%H5414>put<s%> them in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H430>gods;<s%>

Even those did <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%> <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4990>Mithredath<s%> the <S%H1489>treasurer,<s%> and <S%H5608>numbered<s%> them to <S%H8339>Sheshbazzar,<s%> the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

And <S%H428>this<s%> is the <S%H4557>number<s%> of them: <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H105>chargers<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H105>chargers<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H4252>knives,<s%>

<S%H7970>Thirty<s%> <S%H3713>basins<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H3713>basins<s%> of a <S%H4932>second<s%> sort <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten,<s%> and <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> a <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and of <S%H3701>silver<s%> were <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> these did <S%H8339>Sheshbazzar<s%> <S%H5927>bring<s%> up with them of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%> that were <S%H5927>brought<s%> up from <S%H894>Babylon<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
